name: Yutaka Akiyama
content: Akiyama Laboratory, Institute of Science Tokyo In our laboratory, we analyze big data of medical science, pharmacy and biology and research on technologies of a large-scale simulation with a supercomputer and cloud computing.We aim at solving the cause of a disease, supporting drug development and application for analysis of microorganisms in the environment.
